short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replies tracker to motivate you to engage more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReplyMore is an extension that helps new accounts grow on twitter by replying to other people's accounts. It helps you to : 
- Set a daily goal to gamify the experience 
- Filter early viral posts to reply on 
- Track how much you're replying vs time spent on the app
